original_text: Instead, always think about the things that are important in the kingdom of heaven. Always do what God shows you is right. Then he will also give you the things that you need each day.
korean_text: 그런즉 너희는 먼저 그의 나라와 그의 의를 구하라 그리하면 이 모든 것을 너희에게 더하시리라

sentences.original_text: Instead, always think about the things
that are important in the kingdom of heaven
Always do what God shows you
Then he will also give you
the things that you need each day
